allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$payload = ''{""event"":""product:created"",""data"":{""id"":999,""name"":""Test Product""}}''; $secret = ''ARVIN''; $hmac = New-Object System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA256; $hmac.Key = [Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetBytes\($secret\); $hash = $hmac.ComputeHash\([Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetBytes\($payload\)\); $signature = [BitConverter]::ToString\($hash\).Replace\(''-'',''''\).ToLower\(\); Write-Host ""Signature: $signature""; curl -s -X POST http://76.13.22.110:3001/webhook/events -H ''Content-Type: application/json'' -H ""X-Webhook-Signature: $signature"" -d $payload")
